info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elbert County through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elberton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Nancy Hart State Park, Middleton, Lake Russell, Fortsonia, Sweet City and Rice Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
